amendment.description: To clarify the boundaries of the Plum Island Unit of the Coastal Barrier Resources System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 88 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 88 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1432) To clarify the boundaries of the Plum Island Unit of the Coastal Barrier Resources System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 88 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 88 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Warner.
